ygData.subject: Re: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor (Re: Digest Number 482)
ygData.msgSnippet: I wouldn t make the item disappear automatically..but I would make it somewhat like Diablo..an icon popped on the screen signifying your equipment needed
ygData.messageBody:
I wouldn't make the item disappear automatically..but I would make it
somewhat like Diablo..an icon popped on the screen signifying your equipment
needed repair. The big difference..as you mentioned..is the camping issue.
Obviously you don't have to camp for gear in Diablo. If people don't watch
their inventory and repair their gear and then lose the item that they may
have spent many, many hours camping...ouch.

I have heard different stories about the hell levels. Supposedly Verant
'accidentally put this code into the game? And then decided to leave it
there as a feature? Hard to believe. Even harder to believe given Brad
McQuaid's past statements. One thing McQuaid has said..and I have probably
repeated here..is that he "never said it would be an easy game". Of the 3
major MMORPGs (EQ, UO, AC) Everquest is probably the most difficult and the
most unforgiving for player mistakes.
